Name: GORILLA MODE ENERGY
Description: Gorilla Mode "Energy" is our aggressively dosed turnkey energy formula designed for maxed out performance and intense focus.  It is branded as a pre-workout, but it more broadly serves as an all around high potency energy formula.  You can expect a very clean boost in mental clarity, productivity, focus and energy with this product.  Gorilla Mode "Energy" contains a massive dose of carefully chosen synergistic stimulants and nootropics.  This product is designed specifically for energy and mental sharpness, so it does not contain any Nitric Oxide precursors, plasma expanders, or volumizing agents like Gorilla Mode and Gorilla Mode Nitric do.  As it is a pure energy formula, it can be stacked alongside our stimulant-free pre-workout Gorilla Mode Nitric to create an extremely potent all around pre-workout.  Just like all of our other products, look at the label and compare it to your current pre-workout.
